subject: Grant of change of land use permission for setting up of a Warehouse for storage of agro produce in the revenue estate of village Gadaipur, Distt. Gurgaon- Smt. Sumarti Devi etc.
purpose: setting up a Warehouse for storage of agriculture produce
terms_and_conditions: That the conditions of agreement executed by you with the Director General, Town & Country Planning, Haryana, Chandigarh and the provisions of the Punjab Scheduled roads and Controlled restriction of Unregulated Development Act, 1963 and rules framed there under are duly complied with by you.

That you shall pay the additional amount of Conversion Charges for any variation in area at site and deposit the revised Conversion charges in lump sum within 30 days as and when detected and demanded by the Director General, Town & Country Planning, Haryana, Chandigarh.

That you shall give at least 75% employment to the domiciles of Haryana where the posts are not of technical nature and a quarterly statement indicating the category wise total employment and of those who belongs to Haryana shall be furnished to the GM, DIC, Gurgaon.
That you shall deposit the EDC/IDC to the Govt. Agency which will demand the same as & when site will come under Urbanizable Zone.

That you shall get the building plans approved from the Director General/ Authorized Officer before commencing any construction on the said land and start construction within six months from the issuance of this permission.
That you shall obtain Occupation Certificate from the department after completing the building within two years of issuance of this permission.
That this permission shall be valid for two years from the date of issue of this letter subject to fulfillment of the terms and conditions of the permission granted and agreement executed.

That if it is found at any time that warehouse is being used for storage for non agriculture produce (for which conversation charges are higher). an amount equivalent to double the difference of conversion charges shall be recovered from you alongwith interest @ 12% per annum from the date of grant of change of land use permission.
That you will have no objection to acquire the land, if required for road widening.
That no commercial/industrial manufacturing activity shall be undertaken at site and site shall be exclusively used for storage purpose only.
That you will pay the Labour Cess before approval of building plans and you will be maintain the revenue rasta/road.
That this permission shall be valid for two years from the date of issue of this letter subject to fulfillment of the terms and conditions of the permission granted and agreement executed.
That this permission will not provide any immunity from any other Act/Rules/Regulations applicable to the land in question.
